citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:31 PM on 20
APRIL 2022. Inspector arrived at the facility, called the licensee at 2:31 PM and left a voicemail. At 2:36 PM the licensee
called back and notified the inspector that no responsible adult was available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:31 PM on 20

called back and notified the inspector that no responsible adult was available for an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
